description: Rings of fresh pineapple flambéd in rum or brandy make a smart restaurant-style dessert.
name: Pineapple Flambé Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and thinly slice the pineapple. Cut out the tough core using a small round cutter or the tip of a sharp knife.

Put the pineapple slices and any pineapple juice into a large frying pan with the rum and lime juice and heat. Light the alcohol by carefully tilting the pan into the gas flame, or by using a match, and allow the flames to die down.

Dot the pineapple with butter and sprinkle with sugar. Shake the pan while heating gently, until the butter melts, the sugar dissolves, and the mixture thickens to a glaze. Serve with quark or Greek yoghurt and a dusting of ground cinnamon.
